Articles.Content: This is not a thinly veiled .23 release date request. im only asking that if i started a new career mode, do you think i would have more than 3 weeks before the save got broken? I get antsy when its been a month since the last update and i dont want to start a new time-sink if my work is going to be gone in a couple days. .22 had an experimental phase they announced prior to release. might they do that again as a warning you think?
Go for it. .22 hasn't been out for that long, so it'll probably be a while before the next update.
I'd say you've got until at least late January. Hopefully we get a Christmas present from Squad this year though, but that won't be a major update.

This might not have been *intended* to be a question about release dates, but that's essentially what it is. And since 1) nobody knows because Squad does not announce such things, and 2) such questions are against forum rule 2.3.c, let's just lock this thread and move on to other topics, shall we?

Edited November 17, 2013 by Vanamonde
